item.description:
Fun times with a favorite pastime! Its indoor courts w/ decent setup. Looking for 8 players.

A couple of details...
- Entry fee is $12 or split a booklet of 10 for $100
- No black soles or street shoes (shoe rentals $5). BYOsocks
- Please bring your own racket (or rent one for $5)
- Please bring or share a tube of (feather) shuttlecocks. You can also buy some there.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Badminton (Westborough)
